data.name: XExtendedDocumentHandler
desc: this interface does not conform to the SAX-standard.
Note: Whether or not every callback is supported is dependent on the parser implementation.

methods.name: allowLineBreak
desc: informs a writer that it is allowable to insert a line break and indentation before the next XDocumentHandler-call.

methods.name: comment
desc: receives notification about a comment in the XML-source.

methods.name: endCDATA
desc: informs about the end of a CDATA-Section.
Note that startCDATA/endCDATA MUST NOT enclose any startElement/endElement-call!

methods.name: startCDATA
desc: receives notification about the start of a CDATA section in the XML-source.
Any string coming in via character handler may include chars, that would otherwise be interpreted as markup.

methods.name: unknown
desc: notifies that any characters that cannot be handled by other callback methods are announced through this method.
